attributes.action: START LEGAL PROCEEDINGS AGAINST TONY BLAIR AND GEORGE W BUSH TO STAND ACCUSED OF WAR CRIMES REGARDING THE ILLEGAL WAR IN IRAQ
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: THIS IS FOR TONY BLAIR AND GEORGE W BUSH TO STAND ACCUSED OF WAR CRIMES REGARDING THE ILLEGAL WAR IN IRAQ , THEY WENT TO WAR ON FALSE ACCUSATIONS OF IRAQ AND SADDAM HUSSEIN BEING IN THE POSSESSION OF W.M.D.WHEN IN ACTUAL FACT GEORGE W BUSH JUST WANTS THE U.S. TO CONTROL THE IRAQI OILFIELDS,THE SAME AS THE U.S.DOES IN SAUDI ARABIA

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
